start_messages: Hi there, I'm Charlie and I'm ready to do your commands.
sleep_messages: I think you don't need me for now, I will be back when you call me again.
I'm going to sleep, if you need me, just call. I will be here then.
call_messages: I'm here, what can I do for you?
Okay, I'm here, what can I do for you?
Okay, I came, what's the matter?
I'm here, what do you want?
